item.title: I have successfully defended my PhD theis on 23rd Jan 2025
item.description: Thanks to all the members of examaination board, and my friends came to support me! 2022.01.03～2025.01.23🎓 3 years & 20 days It was an exhilarating journey, filled with unexpected twists and frustrations Reaching a milestone, ready to move towards a more challenging and exciting future 💪🏻 PhD Defense
